"sayitam aayathanaye waidyawarunta pramithiya na"kiya api owunta chodana karanawa namme kramayata kriya kala yuthuyi.[ada ape waidyawarunta nithigatha pramithiyak na.]1, waidyawarayeku path karana nirnayakarate nithiyak widiyata nithi gatha karaganimu..2, ee nithi matha sayitam ekata nadu damu..3, nithi margayen sayitam eka wahamu.me piliwelata wada karanawa nammama ee parshawayata ekathu wenawa.rate nithiwala sahaya nosoyanithimaya padanamakin thorawahithumatheta wada karana pirisak samagawiyaruwen men hasirennatathme dakwarate nithiyata anuwa kriya karanasayitam ekata wiruddhawa kriya kirimatathnithigaruka janathawata baha.aarambhayak widiyata"waidyawarayeku path karana nirnayakarate nithiyak widiyata nithi gatha karaganna.."ee sandaha janatha sahaya illanna.mamath ee parshawayata ekathu wenawa.thamanta prathikara karannata enawaidyawaru path karana nirnayakarate nithiyak widiyata nithi gatha kirimajanathawa sathu wagakimak.nirnayaka nithigatha karagenaee nithi anuwa "pramithiya na" kiya sayitam ekata nadu danna..sayitam eka wahannanithiyata pitin wada karannajanathawa iththan kara ganima bala wadak.marayan, damarikayan nowananithi garuka janathawak widiyataewannakata sahaya denna baha...

siyaluma deha kriyakarithwayan(prathishakthiya , homona saha snayu paddhathi) sambandhayen witamina magin itha wadagath karyabharayak itu wana bawa amuthuwen kiwa yuthu nowana athara, apage dehayata witamin nipadawa gatha nohaki bawin kridakayan wisin eewa aahara ho wenath athireka aakarawalin labagathayuthu weyi.
sobhitha budurajanan wahanse sathiyaka kalayak dushkara kriya kota na gasaka mula budu bawata pathwiya.sudhamma raju ha sudhamma dewiya mawpiyan wiya.
bar prayis thama .

mema janatha wirodhatha aarambha wu awasthawedi apatath kipawitak ethanata pamina mema wirodhathawayanata sahaya dena lesa illa siti namuth deshapalanagnyayin washayen apa ethanata giyanam methana di deshapalana muhunuwarak ganimata ida athi heyin apa kale ee wenuwata dinapatha adala niladharinta wahama kriyathmaka wana lesa illa siti bawa ohu kiya sitiyeya mehidi rajayen itu wiya yuthu wada kotasa kshanikawa sidu nowima abhagyayak bawath janatha hagim uthsanna wu awasthawaka sidu wiya yuththe sakachchawak bawath hethema sandahan kaleya.

namuth thrupthiya wadikirimata obata kala haki dewal bohomayak thibenawa nithipatha diwa ra nadaththu karanna abhiyogawalata muhuna denna oba, obe sahakaru saha obe daruwan samanga iwasimen katayuthu karanna pawulak lesa winoda wanna wenath pawul samanga mithrathwayan pawathwa gena yama saha obe pawula samanga samipawa sitinna (mema sabandatha saukhya sampanna nam) obata eya awashya nam upakara laba ganima wadagath we.
